ygData.subject: RE: Patch Update today
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure how you were getting what you were getting but I do know that when fighting Chief SaNre Rexsa late last week and getting rooted my Selo s would not
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure how you were getting what you were getting but I do know that when
fighting Chief SaNre'Rexsa late last week and getting rooted my Selo's would
not break it.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)

8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: John.Curry@... [mailto:John.Curry@...]
8)Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 11:16 AM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Update today
8)
8)
8)From: John.Curry@...
8)
8)I have heared many people mention that Selo's no longer
8)breaks root. Now I
8)thought that might be wrong, because I was breaking Ghoul
8)Root, in Unrest
8)and Oasis, 2 days after the patch that caused it. Even after
8)doing this
8)probably a half a dozen times. I chalked it up to
8)conisidence. But last
8)night I was fighting Orcs in Highpass, and I got rooted a
8)couple of times
8)from... it was either Fanatic or Medic... when I clicked
8)Selos's just to
8)see, both times I was released right when I got the boot
8)symbol. Has anyone
8)else noticed this. Or has anyone else been unable to get
8)unrooted? Am I
8)just really lucky, or perhaps someone has an explanation.
8)
8)Sevin Tercet 22nd Human Bard
8)on Brell
8)
